document_data.name: Orebreaker
document_data.mainbody: '''Orebreaker''' was a [[dwarven]] smith in [[Freedale]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was old, and the oldest person in Freedale at the time.
document_data.Abilities: He was one of the best blacksmiths in the [[Dalelands]].
document_data.Activities: Orebreaker made high-quality armor pieces and weaponry that were sold through the the general store, and sometimes customized equipment.
document_data.Relationships: He was looking for an apprentice.
